text: Less Than Perfect was an American television series. It was a sitcom that began airing on ABC on October 1, 2002 and ended on June 6, 2006. The series is about a young female office employee (played by Sara Rue) and her co- workers The series was directed by Skip Collector and Ted Wass, among others. == Other websites == * Category:2000s American sitcoms Category:2002 American television series debuts Category:2006 American television series endings Category:English-language television programs Category:ABC network series
title: Less Than Perfect
